description: From Yiddish זאַפֿטיק‎ (zaftik), cognate to German saftig (“juicy”). Doublet of sappy.

adjectives.description: zaftig (comparative more zaftig, superlative most zaftig)

entries.meaning: (US, colloquial, of a woman) Having a plump and sexually attractive figure; voluptuous, well-proportioned; large.
examples: Synonyms: buxom, Rubenesque, voluptuous; see also Thesaurus:voluptuous
